title: Mobile-Based Genre-Focused English Workplace Communication Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English Grammar and Vocabulary Comprehension
context.additional_context: Education focusing on business English practice for working professionals who only own smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can explain and analyze the structural characteristics of five workplace genres, including business emails, reports, and presentation materials.
Learners can compose texts utilizing genre-specific linguistic features (formality, vocabulary, sentence structure).
Learners can improve their genre-specific writing proficiency to over 80% accuracy through peer feedback and mobile quizzes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
